casebody.data:
Edwin A. THOMPSON, by His Guardian Ad Litem, Willard S. Thompson, v. TELLURIDE POWER COMPANY. No. 5. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. June 2, 1930. King & King, of Salt Lake City, Utah, for appellant. H. R. Waldo, of Salt Lake City, Utah, and Ered R.. Wright, of Denver, Colo., for appellee.

Before LEWIS, COTTERAL, and MeDERMOTT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed June 2, 1930, on motion of appellee.
